title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for volumetric flow integral

1 point is earned for the average volumetric flow

1 point is earned for answer with reason

Let C be the cross-sectional area approximation from part (c). The average volumetric flow is 1 20 ∫ 10 60 C ⋅v(t)dt=2181.912 or 2181.913 ft 3 /min

Yes, water must be diverted since the average volumetric flow for this 20-minute period exceeds 2100 ft3 / min
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

1 point is earned for volumetric flow integral

1 point is earned for the average volumetric flow

1 point is earned for answer with reason

Let C be the cross-sectional area approximation from part (c). The average volumetric flow is

1 20 ∫ 10 60 C ⋅v(t)dt=2181.912 or 2181.913 ft 3 /min

Yes, water must be diverted since the average volumetric flow for this 20-minute period exceeds 2100 ft3 / min

The student response earns one of the following points:

1 point is earned for volumetric flow integral

1 point is earned for the average volumetric flow
